Visualization with Django - WebApp
====================================

.. todo:: change paths if there is a minimal script without webapp

..  rst-class:: bignums

1. Assure the correct IP and Port
2. Assure the correct folder strucute e.g missing folders or logs
3. Start the `WebApp <https://git.uibk.ac.at/mechatronik/fertigungstechnik/automatica2022/automatica2022-webapp>`_
